body.name: Century Drive On 3-in-1 Car Seat | All-in-One Car Seat for Kids 5-100 lb, Berry
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 22 hrs 29 mins
features: 3-in-1 CAR SEAT: Rear-facing with harness: 5-40 lb; forward-facing with harness: 22-65 lb; and forward-facing booster: 40-100 lb
HAPPY PLANET COLLECTION: Fabrics made with recycled materials as part of our Do More promise to Recycle, Reimagine, and Give Back
SLIM, SPACE-SAVING DESIGN: It's a back seat space savior
NO STRAP STRUGGLE: No-rethread harness system; one-hand, 6-position headrest and harness adjust together
6-POSITION RECLINE: 3 rear-facing and 3 forward-facing positions for the right install
KEEPSAFE PROTECTION: Designed and tested to help provide safe and secure protection so you can focus on the road ahead
SIDE-IMPACT PROTECTION: Side-impact tested for occupant retention with the built-in 5-point harness system
INSTALLS WITH SEAT BELT OR LATCH: Whatever is the easiest and best install for you
HARNESS STORAGE FOR BOOSTER MODE: Keep it neat
COMFY-COZY DETAILS: Keep your mini snug with infant safety supports and harness covers
body.description: Finally, something your kiddo won't outgrow so fast—we're looking at you, newborn onesies. Listen, growing up happens, and your little needs to be safe and secure every step of the way. Enter the Century Drive On 3-in-1 Car Seat, nicknamed "The Fantastic Fit" for its clever, streamlined design. Part of our Happy Planet Collection, this car seat is made with fabrics made from recycled materials. That's part of our Do More promise to Recycle, Reimagine, and Give Back. With 3 modes of use for kids 5-100 lb, it grows as your mini does. Also awesome: Its slim design saves precious back seat space, so there's plenty of room for everyone else. And how about this? A no-rethread harness system means no strap struggle when it's time to adjust. The one-hand adjustment leaves one hand to pull snug and one hand for baby—makes sense, right? Century KeepSafe means this seat is designed and tested to help provide safe and secure protection so you can focus on the road ahead.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Century Drive On 3-in-1 Car Seat With 3 modes of use for kids 5-100 lb, this car seat grows as your mini does. Also awesome: Its slim design saves precious back seat space, so there's plenty of room for everyone else.

Everything You Need KeepSafe Protection Our car seats have KeepSafe Protection to meet or exceed US FMVSS 213 safety standards for crash protection. Slim, Space-Saving Design It's a back seat space savior! With a slim profile and lightweight design, there's plenty of room for everyone. Installation Made Easy Installs with the vehicle seat belt or LATCH: Whatever is the easiest and best install for you!

Our Do More Promise Bringing our tiny humans into this great big world has only strengthened our commitment to take care of it—and each other. Here are some of the things we’re doing to help you feel good about choosing Century.

Happy Planet As part of our commitment to Do More, we take single-use plastic water bottles and break them down into chips that are then woven into fabrics for our Happy Planet Collection. Happy Kids No matter how many toys they have, your kid's favorite is inevitably a cardboard box. Inspired by our own kids, we share easy projects to turn packaging into playtime. Happy People We care passionately about supporting families of all shapes and sizes, so we partner with non-profits that support family services.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality, just what I expected
reviews.reviewText: Century is a brand I have been familiar with since my children were babies. So when my grandson graduated from a rear facing baby seat, I knew we all wanted him to ride in a comfortable, safe, good quality front facing seat.I ordered two of these car seats to start with. They are appropriate for both front facing and rear facing set up. They arrived set up for rear facing use. I checked everything out carefully to make sure this was good enough for my most precious cargo.After NOT reading the instructions properly, and through the ensuing trial and error, I figured out that this seat is easy to secure properly and firmly in my car. The lower anchor straps do need to be relocated for front facing use, and this is really easy! Once done, installation is quick. (Found that out the hard way of course)I love how padded and comfortable this seat is, the ease in which the shoulder straps can be adjusted by raising and lowering the headrest and will grow with my grandson, the seat recline settings, the side impact protection, the cup holders are a nice bonus too.Once I figured out that this was a great car seat, I bought my daughter and son in law one for each of their cars, then ordered a third one for my car since I'm incredibly blessed to live in the same town as my kids and grandson, and I get to grandparent him a lot while his Mum and Dad are both working.Incidentally, Century was bought out in 2000 by Graco. Now Graco makes a lower price point car seat under the brand name of Century. Century is not an unknown brand with no history, as some people believe....it's just not as ridiculously expensive as Graco branded car seats.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product is durable, adjustable, comfortable, multiple colors to choose from, and easily installed in the vehicle. I appreciate being able to use this car seat for many early stages/years of a child’s youth, from birth to toddler.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this car seat ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
reviews.reviewText: This car seat is solid (great styling, well constructed, easy to install, cup holders a bonus) and it’s priced so well we were able to buy 3 for each of the relevant vehicles. I hate wasting money (in this case hundreds of dollars) for a specific brand name (you’re paying for marketing and falling into the consumer trap) when the generic item is almost exactly the same item. No one needs to pay $500 for a car seat, when the same safety features are available at 1/4 to 1/5 the cost. Plus the bonus is that the baby absolutely loves it (so much better than trying to lay an active 20-lb 8-mo old on their back like a newborn). Highly recommended! 5-stars ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ BUY IT!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great cheaper alternative to Knox
reviews.reviewText: We purchased this as a travel car seat for our toddler because our Uppababy Knox car seat is way too heavy and bulky for airplane travel. It functions very similarly to our Knox, is lightweight and my rear-facing toddler is comfortable in it. The cupholders are the only annoying part: they are required for use and are difficult to attach. I’d still recommend it, even as a full-time car seat!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Needed a rear to front seater and this works great. Toddler loves it and seems very comfy, practical cup holders. Only vent would be shoulder harness is not very adjustable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It was a smooth transition
reviews.reviewText: I was putting off the switch to a convertible carseat but this was a lot easier to install than I was expecting and my son seems immensely more comfortable. I love that it grows with him and it fit perfectly in my chevy cruze.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great car seat & great value

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Met all the safety standards. It is lightweight and easy to handle.
